import React from 'react' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import { Navbar, Nav, Container, NavDropdown } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { logout } from '../actions/userActions' function Header() { const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) //prende le informazioni dell'utente dallo store const { userInfo } = userLogin const dispatch = useDispatch() const logoutHandler = () => { dispatch(logout()) } return (
Proshop
Cart {userInfo ? (

ciao

 ) : (

ciao

)} Link
) } export default Header
